name: Williams Lowen
text: Fast delivery and good pizza. Enough was said about pizza hut taste, one of  the best. Wish they could make their spices to add to their pizzas more interesting. Good pizza.

name: Felecia Butler
text: Meat Lovers - BOMB ....

name: Joyce Fuentes
text: Great location, off of RTE 5. Can't miss it from traffic, tons of free parking. They are friendly, have restrooms on site, clean tables and dine-in area, they also have the lunch buffet during the week.

name: Rory Johnson
text: The dining area was neat and clean.  I tried a Pan Pizza it was tasty but I'll try another crust next time.  No fault with the Hut, I just didn't care much for this type of crust.

name: Shelley White
text: This is one of the few sit down restaurants that Pizza Hut has. The boys love it especially the brownies. They also have a all u can eat bar during lunch time. Quite nice different types of pizza, pasta, bread sticks. They do have a regular menu as well.

name: Anthony Lloyd
text: It‚Äôs 920 and the store is closed. Signage clearly states they close at 10 as well as their website. Asked an individual standing outside who claimed to be an employee who stated they had ‚Äúnothing to make the orders with.‚Äù What kind of pizza place is this?

name: Margarette Williams
text: Nice staff. Pizza prepared hot and tasty. Restaurant needs updating and is a bit dingy.

name: Joe Ryan
text: Good food. The kids liked it. Our server was kind and attentive.

name: Jazmine Sessoms
text: I ordered pizza 2 hours in  andadvance. The driver never came, and he never called me, but lied to his manager and said I wouldn't answer. The manager was no help. I spoke with her many times and she said she would call me back but never did. I don't think I've had worse customer service.

name: Brian Watson
text: Pizza is always delicious. Seems to take,way longer than it should to get your order tho.

name: MsScales
text: Pizza is good when they make it correctly. Sometimes pizza is under cooked. They have a great all you can eat. Very underrated location.

name: Charles Sidwell
text: Staff has always treated me good here.  They have an all you can eat pizza buffet there in the early afternoons on weekdays.  If they don't have what you want, they offer to make a pizza for you (in my case, a veggy pizza deep dish). ‚Ä¶More

name: Derick Davis
text: Love coming here for the weekday lunch buffet. They put out the usual cheese, pepperoni, and works . They also put out some of their other specialties which gives you a chance to try them and see if you like it. It has helped me decide on ordering them for delivery.

name: Aiyana
text: They need to not have a limited delivery area and deliver peoples food. Lazy selvesüôÑ

name: Mikeah Hayman
text: The customer service was really good and the food was on point

name: Shuntaye Washington
text: This place is really hit or miss, today I ordered two medium pizzas that were horrible... the pizza hardly had any sauce or cheese on it,  and it was very dry. The bathroom was disgusting, and the manager is very rude....this is my last visit here.

name: The Evans Crew
text: Good service. Yes they may get it wrong sometimes, but we are human.. no perfection in any of us. However, when they get it wrong they do try to compensate or accommodate for it.

name: Alexandercollier 24
text: Had a great buffet food a great price

name: Ray C
text: Called in a carryout order on my way home, and what do we have. I got to pizza hut to pick up my order and find out the young lady who took my order didn't save it, and I had to re-order ond wait another 30 mins. The young lady never came forward and said she was sorry for the inconvenience. How rude!!!!

name: Michael H
text: I had a carryout order that was sold to someone else with the same name by mistake. The crew expressed there disappointment about there mistake, and offered me the order for free! Great service and clean environment.

name: Omar Stokes
text: One of the only dine in Pizza Huts left..... Its filthy and the servers are pretty clueless.  Enjoy!!!

name: Moniques Marquez
text: Great pizza, never really a wait to be seated, relaxed environment, nice service. I actually love this place in this location.

name: Nicholas Chappell
text: Fast service and a friendly staff.

name: Cris H
text: Polite server, pizza was hot.

name: Nicky Allen
text: great Service, nice company, awsome price

name: Bryan Shipman
text: The lunch pizza and pasta buffet is sort of so so, it could definitely be better with a few more items. But it's an affordable and fast lunch.

name: de Framabrico
text: Good customer service .Will eat there again.

name: Jan Peterson
text: Great for, good service

name: Chris B
text: I have been using this Pizza Hut since 2004 when I moved here.  The place has gone way downhill over that time.  Multiple issues with the place can be noted just by walking in the door. ‚Ä¶More

name: Eliezer Zuniga
text: i really like this place ..the food and the service its really good i just to go to a pizza hut in bowie..but they changed the workers and the service changed..so this its my new favorite pizza hut restaurant. ...

name: Laurie Monk
text: Friendly atmosphere. Hot food.

name: Cynthia Stebbins
text: I love pizza crust cheese.

name: Frostcanine
text: Pizza hut s' cookers make great dough and sauce!

name: Shawn Shawn
text: Great service and great food so far but the place can use an upgrade inside.

name: Rob Beck
text: Cool staff and speedy food

name: Atriece Johnson
text: Pizza always good, but restaurant needs renovation, looks filthy outside and inside.

name: Priscilla Benner
text: Everytime I order here they mess up my oreder super bad and take for ever or my pizza looks like it was kicked down the street on tbe way here...

name: Jay Spurlin
text: Quiet.  Still the same good pizza.

name: B_Rad FrmBu
text: Chris B don't know what he talkin bout tis place is da bomb

name: Luqman Malik
text: They've been good to me for 12yrs ...!!

name: kenneth white
text: Very good customer service

name: Pam Baylor
text: Very dirty, will not go back

name: Ramona Hopps
text: Lady at the cash register was great!!

name: Lisa Brown

name: Yoki Smith

name: CEXXXYCYNDI

name: Nitin B
text: Not clean at all. Pizza was ok.

name: carlos sagastume
text: They change workers the 2 last times the waitress mess my order up....she does not bother to write it down...i dont think I'm going back there..

name: Thomas Compton IV
text: Rarely have a bad experience whether it be delivery or carryout

name: KB
text: Love it!

name: Derek Lovett
text: Loved it

text: Love it

text: Pizza is good nice location
